tagline: Ab kuch shikhao filmy style main
team_size: No limits but all participant must have the ID card.
description: Each participant will be given a topic on which they have to shoot/make a short film with their phone or camera. The participant should ensure that their short films have to be creative and unique. The short-listed films would be played in the final function.
rules: Topic will be given 10 days before the event.
The film must 5 to 10 minutes duration.
The film must not be any downloaded film and all the characters in that film submit their id cards copy of pdf to us.
There should not be any seen against any region religion cast place or any particular name.
Winning_prize: Attractive cash prizes to the winner and runner-up would be given
